page.title: 01CONSTANTINE GAZETTEER
page.content: Constantine in Cornwall,population approx.2000,mileage to Helston 7 miles, Falmouth 6miles,Truro 17miles,Penzance 18miles,Plymouth 85 miles,London 269 miles.Part of Kerrier Rural District Council.Largest parish in Cornwall. Parish council Chairman Mr.Bray. Health centre-oneDr.Roberts.Dentist Mr.Zoarab.Accomodation at:Inns two, Trengilly and Queens arms.Bus services three to Helston;Tuesdays,Thursdays only to Falmouth, also a private mini bus on Saturday.Post offices,one at Constantine General stores,off licence delicatessen.Newsagents,one. Garages two;Bakery one.Sports clubs, six,Anglers,rugby,football,cricket, badminton,bowls.Scial club one Churches two,Restaurant one,Corndolly .Public telephones three.School, Primary,one,Head Mr.Wiseman.
